newsItems.title: New Insights on Anorexia Nervosa Treatment
newsItems.summary: A groundbreaking study reveals promising new treatment methods for managing anorexia, focusing on both psychological and nutritional approaches.

newsItems.title: Understanding the Psychological Triggers of Anorexia
newsItems.summary: Experts explore the deep-rooted psychological factors contributing to anorexia, such as body dysmorphia and social pressures.

newsItems.title: The Role of Family Support in Recovery from Anorexia
newsItems.summary: Family involvement in therapy has been shown to significantly improve outcomes for individuals suffering from anorexia.
